name: Typing should show up right away when editing a message using the up arrow

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
Typing should show up right away when editing a message using the up arrow
--------------------
1. Post a message
2. Hit the up arrow to open the "edit modal"
3. Begin typing straight away as quickly as you can
inline.expectedResult: There is no delay in letters appearing in the edit modal, no text is lost, and no text appears in the center panel in the background
